item.title: China rams own warship while chasing Philippine vessel
item.description: The crash in the disputed Scarborough Shoal rendered a Chinese warship "unseaworthy", Manila said.

item.title: Watch: Chinese ships collide while pursuing Philippines boat
item.description: Watch: Chinese ships collide while pursuing Philippine boat

item.title: Chip giants Nvidia and AMD to pay 15% of sales revenue in China to US
item.description: The chip giants will hand revenues to the US government in exchange for licences to export to China.

item.title: Five Al Jazeera journalists killed in Israeli strike in Gaza
item.description: Israel said it targeted well known reporter Anas al-Sharif and alleged he was part of Hamas, which Al Jazeera has denied.

item.title: Trump demands homeless people 'immediately' move out of Washington DC
item.description: Trump says homeless people must go "far" from the nation's capital, as part of his anti-crime plan, but the mayor pushes back.
